text: The shuttle captain makes contact with the Death Star.
Command station, this is ST 321. Code Clearance Blue. We're starting our approach. Deactivate the security shield.
The security deflector shield will be deactivated when we have confirmation of your code transmission. Stand by... are clear to proceed.
We're starting our approach.

Operators move about among the control panels. A SHIELD OPERATOR hits switches beside a large screen, on which is display of the Death Star, the moon Endor, and a bright w delineating the invisible deflector shield.
A control officer rushes over to the shield operator.
Inform the commander that Lord Vader's shuttle has arrived.
Yes, sir.
The control officer moves to a view port and watches as t Imperial shuttle lands in the massive docking bay. A squa Imperial stormtroopers moves into formation before the cr

The DEATH STAR COMMANDER, MOFF JERJERROD, a tall, confide technocrat, strides through the assembled troops to the b of the shuttle ramp. The troops snap to attention; many a uneasy about the new arrival. But the Death Star commande stands arrogantly tall.

The exit hatch of the shuttle opens with a WHOOSH, reveal only darkness. Then, heavy FOOTSTEPS AND MECHANICAL BREATHING. From this black void appears DARTH VADER, LORD THE SITH. Vader looks over the assemblage as he walks dow the ramp.
Lord Vader, this is an unexpected pleasure. We're honored by your presence.
You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I'm here to put you back on
schedule.
The commander turns ashen and begins to shake.
I assure you, Lord Vader, my men are working as fast as they can.
Perhaps I can find new ways to motivate them.
I tell you, this station will be operational as planned.
The Emperor does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation.
But he asks the impossible. I need more men.
Then perhaps you can tell him when he arrives.
The Emperor's coming here?
That is correct, Commander. And he is most displeased with your apparent lack of progress.
We shall double our efforts.
I hope so, Commander, for your sake. The Emperor is not as forgiving as I am.

A lonely, windswept road meanders through the desolate Tatooine terrain. We HEAR a familiar BEEPING and a distinctive reply before catching sight of ARTOO-DETOO an SEE-THREEPIO, making their way along the road toward the ominous palace of Jabba the Hutt.
Of course I'm worried. And you should be, too. Lando Calrissian and poor Chewbacca never returned from this awful place.
Artoo whistles timidly.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Don't be so sure. If I told you half the things I've heard about this Jabba the Hutt, you'd probably short-circuit.
The two droids fearfully approach the massive gate to the palace.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Artoo, are you sure this is the right place? I better knock, I suppose.
Threepio looks around for some kind of signaling device, timidly knocks on the iron door.
THREEPIO   (INSTANTLY)
There doesn't seem to be anyone there. Let's go back and tell Master Luke.
A small hatch in the middle of the door opens and a spide mechanical arm, with a large electronic eyeball on the en pops out and inspects the two droids.
STRANGE VOICE
Tee chuta hhat yudd!
THREEPIO
Goodness gracious me!
Threepio points to Artoo, then to himself.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Artoo Detoowha bo Seethreepiowha ey toota odd mischka Jabba du Hutt.
The eye looks from one robot to the other, there is a lau then the eye zips back into the door. The hatch slams shu Artoo beeps his concern.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
I don't think they're going to let us in, Artoo. We'd better go.

Artoo beeps his reluctance as Threepio turns to leave. Suddenly the massive door starts to rise with a horrific metallic SCREECH. The robots turn back and face an endles black cavity. The droids look at one another, afraid to enter.
Artoo starts forward into the gloom. Threepio rushes afte his stubby companion. The door lowers noisily behind them
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Artoo, wait. Oh, dear! Artoo. Artoo, I really don't think we should rush into all this.
Artoo continues down the corridor, with Threepio followin
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Oh, Artoo!     Artoo, wait for me!

The door slams shut with a loud crash that echoes through the dark passageway. The frightened robots are met by two giant, green GAMORREAN GUARDS, who fall in behind them. Threepio glances quickly back at the two lumbering brutes then back to Artoo. One guard grunts an order. Artoo beep nervously.
THREEPIO
Just you deliver Master Luke's message and get us out of here. Oh my! Oh! Oh, no.
Walking toward them out of the darkness is BIB FORTUNA, a humanlike alien with long tentacles protruding from his skull.
BIB
Die Wanna Wanga!
THREEPIO
Oh, my! Die Wanna Wauaga. We -- we bring a message to your master, Jabba the Hutt.
Artoo lets out a series of quick beeps.
THREEPIO   (CONT) (CONT’D)
...and a gift. (thinks a moment, then to Artoo)
Gift, what gift?
Bib shakes his head negatively.
BIB
Nee Jabba no badda. Me chaade su goodie.
Bib holds out his hand toward Artoo and the tiny droid ba up a bit, letting out a protesting array of squeaks. Thre turns to the strange-looking alien.
THREEPIO
He says that our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself.
Bib thinks about this for a moment.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
I'm terribly sorry. I'm afraid he's ever so stubborn about these sort of things.
Bib gestures for the droids to follow.
Nudd Chaa.
The droids follow the tall, tentacled alien into the darkness, trailed by the two guards.
THREEPIO
Artoo, I have a bad feeling about this.

The throne room is filled with the vilest, most grotesque CREATURES ever conceived in the universe. Artoo and Three seem very small as they pause in the doorway to the dimly chamber. Light shafts partially illuminate the drunken courtiers as Bib Fortuna crosses the room to the platform upon which rests the leader of this nauseating crowd: JAB THE HUTT. The monarch of the galactic underworld is a repulsive blob of bloated fat with a maniacal grin. Chain to the horrible creature is the beautiful alien female da named OOLA. At the foot of the dais sits an obnoxious birdlike creature, SALACIOUS CRUMB. Bib whispers somethin the slobbering degenerate's ear. Jabba laughs horribly, a the two terrified droids before him. Threepio bows polite
THREEPIO
Good morning.
Bo Shuda!
The robots jump forward to stand before the repulsive, lo skinned villain.
THREEPIO
The message, Artoo, the message.
Artoo whistles, and a beam of light projects from his dom head, creating a hologram of LUKE on the floor. The image grows to over ten feet tall, and the young Jedi towers ov the space gangsters.
LUKE
Greetings, Exalted One. Allow me to introduce myself. (MORE)

I am Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight and friend to Captain Solo. I know that you are powerful, mighty Jabba, and that your anger with Solo must be equally powerful. I seek an audience with Your Greatness to bargain for Solo's life. (Jabba's crowd laughs) With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation. As a token of my goodwill, I present to you a gift: these two droids.
Threepio is startled by this announcement.
What did he say?
... Both are hardworking and will serve you well.
This can't be! Artoo, you're playing the wrong message.
Luke's hologram disappears.
Jabba laughs while Bib speaks to him in Huttese.
There will be no bargain.
We're doomed.
I will not give up my favorite decoration. I like Captain Solo where he is.
Jabba laughs hideously and looks toward an alcove beside throne. Hanging high, flat against the wall, exactly as w saw him last, is a carbonized HAN SOLO.
Artoo, look! Captain Solo. And he's still frozen in carbonite.

One of Jabba's Gamorrean guards marches Artoo and Threepi down a dank, shadowy passageway lined with holding cells. cries of unspeakable creatures bounce off the cold stone walls. Occasionally a repulsive arm or tentacle grabs thr the bars at the hapless droids. Artoo beeps pitifully.
THREEPIO
What could possibly have come over Master Luke. Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work. Oh! Oh! Hold it! Ohh!
A large tentacle wraps around Threepio's neck. He manages break free, and they move on to a door at the end of the corridor.

The door slides open, revealing a room filled with steam noisy machinery. The guard motions them into the boiler r where they are met by a tall, thin humanlike robot named 9D9. Behind the robot can be seen a torture rack pulling legs off a screaming baby work droid. A second power droi upside down. As smoking branding irons are pressed into h feet, the stubby robot lets out an agonized electronic scream. Artoo and Threepio cringe as the guard grunts to
NINEDENINE
Ah, good. New acquisitions. You are a protocol droid, are you not?
THREEPIO
I am See-Threepio, human-cy...
NINEDENINE
Yes or no will do.
THREEPIO
Oh. Well, yes.
NINEDENINE
How many languages do you speak?
I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...
NINEDENINE
Splendid! We have been without an interpreter since our master got angry with our last protocol droid and disintegrated him.
THREEPIO
Disintegrated?
NINEDENINE   (TO A GAMORREAN GUARD)
Guard! This protocol droid might be useful. Fit him with a restraining bolt and take him back to His Excellency's main audience chamber.
The guard shoves Threepio toward the door.
THREEPIO   (DISAPPEARING)
Artoo, don't leave me! Ohhh!
Artoo lets out a plaintive cry as the door closes. Then h beeps angrily.
You're a feisty little one, but you'll soon learn some respect. I have need for you on the master's Sail Barge. And I think you'll fit in nicely.
The poor work droid in the background lets out another tortured electronic scream.
The court of Jabba the Hutt is in the midst of a drunken, raucous party. Sloppy, smelly monsters cheer and make rud noises as Oola and a fat female dancer perform in front o Jabba's throne.
Jabba leers at the dancers and with a lustful gleam in hi eye beckons Oola to come and sit with him. She stops danc and backs away, shaking her head. Jabba gets angry and po to a spot next to him.
Da Eitha!
The lovely alien shakes her head again and screams.
Na Chuba negatorie Na! Na! Natoota...
Jabba is furious and pulls her toward him, tugging on the chain.
Boscka!

He pushes a button and, before the dancer can flee, a tra door in the floor springs open and swallows her up. As th door snaps shut, a muffled growl is followed by a hideous scream. Jabba and his monstrous friends laugh hystericall and several revelers hurry over to watch her fate through grate.

Threepio cringes and glances wistfully at the carbonite f of Han Solo, but is immediately distracted by a gunshot offscreen. An unnatural quiet sweeps the boisterous gathering. On the far side of the room, the crush of debauchers moves aside to allow the approach of two guard followed by BOUSHH, an oddly cloaked bounty hunter, leadi his captive, Han Solo's copilot, CHEWBACCA THE WOOKIEE.

Bib takes his place next to his disgusting master, and whispers into his ear, pointing at Chewbacca and the boun hunter. Jabba listens intently, then the bounty hunter bo before the gangster and speaks a greeting in a strange, electronically processed tongue (Ubese).
I have come for the bounty on this Wookiee.
Oh, no! Chewbacca!
At last we have the mighty Chewbacca.
Jabba lets out a loud, long, blood-curdling laugh and tur to Threepio, waving him closer. The reluctant droid obeys
Oh, uh, yes, uh, I am here, Your Worshipfulness. Uh... yes!
Jabba continues speaking, as Threepio nervously translate Boushh listens, studying the dangerous creatures around t room. He notices BOBA FETT standing near the door.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Oh. The illustrious Jabba bids you welcome and will gladly pay you the reward of twenty-five thousand.
I want fifty thousand. No less.

Jabba immediately flies into a rage, knocking the golden droid off the raised throne into a clattering heap on the floor. Boushh adjusts his weapon as Jabba raves in Huttes and Threepio struggles back onto the throne. The dishevel droid tries to compose himself.
Uh, oh... but what, what did I say? (to Boushh) Uh, the mighty Jabba asks why he must pay fifty thousand.
The bounty hunter holds up a small silver ball in his han Threepio looks at it, then looks at Jabba, then back to t bounty hunter. The droid is very nervous and Jabba is get very impatient.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Because he's holding a thermal detonator.

The guards instantly back away, as do most of the other monsters in the room. Jabba stares at the silver ball, wh begins to glow in the bounty hunter's hand. The room has fallen into a tense hush. Jabba stares at the bounty hunt malevolently until a sly grin creeps across his vast mout and he begins to laugh.
This bounty hunter is my kind of scum. Fearless and inventive.
Jabba continues.
Jabba offers the sum of thirty- five. And I suggest you take it.
Bib and the other monsters study the bounty hunter and wa for his reaction. Boushh releases a switch on the thermal detonator and it goes dead.
BOUSHH
Zeebuss.
THREEPIO
He agrees!
The raucous crowd of monsters erupts in a symphony of che and applause as the party returns to its full noisy pitch Chewbacca growls.

As he is led away we spot LANDO CALRISSIAN, disguised as skiff guard in a partial face mask. The band starts up an dancing girls take the center of the floor, to the hoots the loudly appreciative creatures.

Boushh leans against a column with gunfighter cool and surveys the scene, his gaze stopping only when it connect with a glare from across the room. Boba Fett is watching Boushh shifts slightly, cradling his weapon lovingly. Bob Fett shifts with equally ominous arrogance.

Gamorrean guards lead Chewie down the same hallway we saw before. When a tentacle reaches out at the Wookiee, Chewi ferocious ROAR echoes against the walls and the tentacle snaps back into its cell in terror. It takes all the guar to hurl Chewie roughly into a cell, slamming the door beh him. Chewie lets out a pathetic howl and bangs on the iro door.
The palace is sitting in the light of the double sunset. the road in front, a large toadlike creature flicks its tongue out for a desert rodent and burps in satisfaction.
Silence. The room is deserted, only the awful debris of t alien celebration giving mute witness to the activity her before. Several drunk creatures lie unconscious around th room, snoring loudly.
A shadowy figure moves stealthily among the columns at th perimeter of the room and is revealed to be Boushh, the bounty hunter. He picks his way carefully through the snoring, drunken monsters.

Han Solo, the frozen space pirate, hangs spotlighted on t wall, his coffin-like case suspended by a force field. Th bounty hunter deactivates the force field by flipping a control switch to one side of the coffin. The heavy case slowly lowers to the floor of the alcove.

Boushh steps up to the case, studying Han, and then turns the controls on the side of the coffin. He activates a se of switches and, after one last hesitant look at Han, sli the de-carbonization lever. The case begins to emit a sou as the hard shell covering the contours of Han's face beg to melt away.

The bounty hunter watches as Han's body is freed of its metallic coat and his forearms and hands, previously rais in reflexive protest, drop slackly to his side. His face muscles relax from their mask of horror. He appears quite dead.

Boushh's ugly helmet leans close to Han's face listening the breath of life. Nothing. He waits. Han's eyes pop ope with a start and he begins coughing. The bounty hunter steadies the staggering newborn.
Just relax for a moment. You're free of the carbonite.
Han touches his face with his hand and moans.
BOUSHH (CONT’D)
Shhh. You have hibernation sickness.
I can't see.
Your eyesight will return in time.
Where am I?
Jabba's palace.
Who are you?
The bounty hunter reaches up and lifts the helmet from hi head, revealing the beautiful face of PRINCESS LEIA.
Someone who loves you.
Leia!
I gotta get you out of here.
As Leia helps her weakened lover to stand up, the relativ quiet is pierced by an obscene HUTTESE CACKLE from the ot side of the alcove.
What's that? I know that laugh.
The curtain on the far side of the alcove opens, revealin Jabba the Hutt, surrounded by Bib and other aliens. He la again, and his gross cronies join in a cacophony of alien glee.
HAN (CONT’D)
Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way to pay you back, but I got a little sidetracked. It's not my fault.
Jabba laughs.
It's too late for that, Solo. You may have been a good smuggler, but now you're Bantha fodder.
HAN
Look...
Take him away!
The guards grab Han and start to lead him away.
Jabba... I'll pay you triple! You're throwing away a fortune here. Don't be a fool!
Han is dragged off, as Lando quickly moves forward and attempts to lead Leia away.
Bring her to me.
Jabba chuckles as Lando and a second guard drag the beaut young princess toward him. Threepio peeks from behind a monster and quickly turns away in disgust.
We have powerful friends. You're gonna regret this...
JABBA   (IN HUTTESE SUBTITLED)
I'm sure.
Inexorably her lovely face moves to within a few inches o Jabba's ugly blob of a head, and Leia turns away in disgu
LEIA
Ugh!
THREEPIO
Ohhh, I can't bear to watch.

The heavy metal door of the dungeon whines and slowly cre open. A guard throws the blinded star captain into the da cell and the door slams shut behind him, leaving only a t sliver of light from a crack in the door. Han is trying t collect himself when suddenly a growl is heard from the f side of the cell. He jumps back against the cell door and listens.
HAN
Chewie? Chewie, is that you?
The shadowy figure lets out a crazy yell and races toward Han, lifting him off the ground with a big hug that carri them into the light, revealing Chewie.
HAN (CONT’D)
Ah! Chew--Chewie!
The giant Wookiee barks with glee.
HAN (CONT’D)
Wait. I can't see, pal. What's goin' on?
Chewie barks an excited blue streak.
HAN (CONT’D)
Luke? Luke's crazy. He can't even take care of himself, much less rescue anybody.
Chewie barks a reply.
HAN (CONT’D)
A...Jedi Knight? I--I'm out of it for a little while, everybody gets delusions of grandeur.
Chewie growls insistently. He holds Han to his chest and his head.
HAN (CONT’D)
I'm all right, pal. I'm all right.
Noisily, the main gate lifts to flood the blackness with blinding LIGHT and reveal the silhouetted figure of LUKE SKYWALKER.
He is clad in a robe similar to Ben's and wears neither pistol nor laser sword. Luke strides purposefully into th hallway. Two giant guards move to block Luke's path. Luke halts.
Luke raises his hand and points at the puzzled guards, wh immediately lower their spears and fall back. The young J lowers his hand and moves on down the hallway.

Bib Fortuna appears out of the gloom. He speaks to Luke a they approach each other, but Luke doesn't stop and Bib m reverse his direction and hurry alongside the young Jedi order to carry on the conversation. Several other guards in behind them in the darkness.
LUKE
I must speak with Jabba.
Bib answers in Huttese, shaking his head in denial. Luke stops and stares at Bib; he raises his hand slightly.
LUKE (CONT’D)
You will take me to Jabba now!
Bib turns in hypnotic response to Luke's command, and Luk follows him into the gloom.
LUKE (CONT’D)
You serve your master well.
Bib responds.
LUKE (CONT’D)
And you will be rewarded.

Jabba is asleep on his throne, with Leia lying in front o him. Salacious sits by Jabba's tail, watching it wriggle. Leia is now dressed in the skimpy costume of a dancing gi a chain runs from a manacle/necklace at her throat to her master, Jabba the Hutt. Threepio stands behind Jabba as B comes up to the gangster slug.
At last! Master Luke's come to rescue me.
BIB
Master.
Jabba awakens with a start and Bib continues, in Huttese.
BIB (CONT’D)
...Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight.
I told you not to admit him.
I must be allowed to speak.
He must be allowed to speak.
Jabba, furious, clobbers Bib and shoves him away.
You weak-minded fool! He's using an old Jedi mind trick.
Luke stares hard at Jabba.
You will bring Captain Solo and the Wookiee to me.
Your mind powers will not work on me, boy.
Nevertheless, I'm taking Captain Solo and his friends. You can either profit by this... or be destroyed! It's your choice. But I warn you not to underestimate my powers.
Jabba's laugh is mean and loud. Threepio attempts to warn Luke about the pit.
Master Luke, you're standing on...
There will be no bargain, young Jedi. I shall enjoy watching you die.
Luke reaches out, and a pistol jumps out of a guard's hol and flies into Luke's hand. The bewildered guard grabs fo as Jabba raises his hand.
JABBA (CONT’D)
Bascka!

The floor suddenly drops away, sending Luke and the haple guard into the pit. The pistol goes off, blasting a hole the ceiling. Jabba laughs and his courtiers join in. Leia starts forward but is restrained by a human guard-- Lando recognizable behind his mask. She looks at him and he sha his head "no."

Luke and the guard have dropped twenty-five feet from a c into the dungeonlike cage. Luke gets to his feet as the g yells hysterically for help. A crowd gathers up around th edge of the pit as the door in the side of the pit starts RUMBLE open. The guard screams in panic. Luke looks calml around for a means of escape.
THREEPIO
Oh, no! The Rancor!

At the side of the pit, an iron door rumbles upward and a giant, fanged RANCOR emerges. The guard runs to the side the pit and tries futilely to scramble to the top. The hideous beast closes in on him.

The Rancor moves past Luke, and as the guard continues to scramble, the Rancor picks him up and pops him into its slavering jaws. A few screams, and the guard is swallowed with a gulp. The audience cheers and laughs at the guard' fate.

The monster turns and starts for Luke. The young Jedi das away just ahead of the monster's swipe at him, and picks the long arm bone of an earlier victim. The monster grabs Luke and brings him up to his salivating mouth. At the la moment, Luke wedges the bone in the monster's mouth and i dropped to the floor. The monster bellows in rage and fla about, hitting the side of the pit, causing an avalanche.

The monster crushes the bone in its jaws and sees Luke, w squeezes into a crevice in the pit wall. Luke looks past monster to the holding cave beyond. On the far side of th holding cave is a utility door--if only he can get to it. Rancor spots Luke and reaches into the crevice for him. L grabs a large rock and raises it, smashing it down on the Rancor's finger.

The Rancor lets out a loud howl as Luke makes a run for t holding cave. He reaches the door and pushes a button to it. When he succeeds, he sees a heavy barred gate between and safety. Beyond the gate two guards look up from their dinner. Luke turns to see the monster heading for him, an pulls with all his might on the gate.
The guards move to the gate and start poking at the young Jedi with spears, laughing.

Luke crouches (against the wall) as the monster starts to reach for him. Suddenly he notices a main door control pa halfway up the wall. As the Rancor moves in for the kill, Luke picks up a skull from the cave floor and hurls it at panel. The giant overhead door comes crashing down on the beast's head, squashing it like a sledgehammer on an egg.

A startled gasp is heard from the stunned court. There's consternation at this turn of events. Heads look to Jabba who is actually turning red with anger. Leia cannot suppr her joy. Jabba utters harsh commands to his guards and th hurry off.
JABBA (IN HUTTESE SUBTITLED)
Bring me Solo and the Wookiee. They will all suffer for this outrage.

The Rancor KEEPERS have come into the cage and are examin their dead beast. One of them breaks down and weeps. The other glares menacingly at Luke, who is unworried. Severa guards rush into the holding tunnel and take Luke away.
The crowd of creepy courtiers parts as Han and Chewie are brought into the throne room, and other guards drag Luke the steps.
LUKE
Han!
HAN
Luke!
LUKE
Are you all right?
HAN
Fine. Together again, huh?
LUKE
Wouldn't miss it.
HAN
How are we doing?
LUKE
The same as always.
That bad, huh? Where's Leia?
Luke looks to Leia.
LEIA
I'm here.
Threepio is standing behind the grotesque gangster as he strokes Leia like a pet cat. Several of the guards, inclu Lando, bring Luke from the other side of the room. Boba i standing behind Jabba.
Threepio steps forward and translates for the captives.
Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.
Good, I hate long waits.
You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlacc.
Doesn't sound so bad.
In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.
On second thought, let's pass on that, huh?
Chewie barks his agreement.
You should have bargained, Jabba. That's the last mistake you'll ever make.
Jabba cackles evilly at this.
As the guards drag the prisoners from the throne room, a cheer rises from the crowd.
Leia and Chewie exchange concerned looks, but Luke Skywal Jedi warrior, cannot suppress a smile.

Jabba's huge SAIL BARGE moves above the desert surface accompanied by two smaller Skiffs. One of the skiffs glid close, revealing Luke, Han, and Chewie -- all in bonds -- surrounded by guards, one of whom is Lando in disguise.
HAN
I think my eyes are getting better. Instead of a big dark blur, I see a big light blur.
LUKE
There's nothing to see. I used to live here, you know.
HAN
You're gonna die here, you know. Convenient.
LUKE
Just stick close to Chewie and Lando. I've taken care of everything.
HAN
Oh... great!

Jabba the Hutt rides like a sultan in the massive antigra ship. His entire retinue is with him, drinking, eating, a having a good time. Leia is watching her friends in the s when the chain attached to her neck is pulled tight and J tugs the scantily clad princess to him.
JABBA (IN HUTTESE SUBTITLED)
Soon you will learn to appreciate me.
Threepio wanders among the Sail Barge aliens, bumping int smaller droid serving drinks, spilling them all over the place. The stubby droid lets out an angry series of beeps whistles.
THREEPIO
Oh, I'm terribly sor... Artoo! What are you doing here?
Artoo beeps a quick reply.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Well, I can see you're serving drinks, but this place is dangerous. They're going to execute Master Luke and, if we're not careful, us too!
Artoo whistles a singsong response.
THREEPIO (CONT’D)
Hmm.   I wish I had your confidence.

The convoy moves up over a huge sand pit. The Sail Barge stops to one side of the depression, as does the escort skiff. But the prisoner's skiff moves out directly over t center and hovers. At the bottom of the deep cone of sand a repulsive, mucous-lined hole, surrounded by thousands o needle-sharp teeth. This is the SARLACC. A plank is exten from the edge of the prisoner's skiff. Guards release Luk bonds and shove him out onto the plank above the Sarlacc' mouth.

Jabba and Leia are now by the rail, watching. Threepio le forward and the slobbering villain mumbles something to h As Threepio steps up to a comlink, Jabba raises his arm a the motley array of intergalactic pirates fall silent. Threepio's voice is amplified across loudspeakers.
Victims of the almighty Sarlacc: His Excellency hopes that you will die honorably. But should any of you wish to beg for mercy, the great Jabba the Hutt will now listen to your pleas.
Han steps forward arrogantly and begins to speak.
Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of... worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us. Right?
Chewie growls his agreement.
Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.
Lando moves unobtrusively along the skiff as Luke shoots quick look of conspiracy to him.
The assembled monsters rock with mocking laughter as Arto zips unnoticed up the ramp to the upper deck. Jabba's laughter subsides as he speaks into the comlink.
JABBA (IN HUTTESE SUBTITLED)
Move him into position.
Jabba makes a thumbs-down gesture. Leia looks worried.

Artoo appears from below and zips over to the rail facing pit. Below, in the skiff, Luke is prodded by a guard to t edge of the plank over the gaping Sarlacc. Luke looks up Artoo, then gives a jaunty salute: the signal the little droid has been waiting for. A flap opens in Artoo's domed head.
JABBA   (IN HUTTESE SUBTITLED)
Put him in.
